name: svg-to-png
title: SVG to PNG Converter
description: Convert vector SVG files to raster PNG images
content:
Overview

This application converts vector SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics) files to raster PNG images. Built using CairoSVG, it provides high-quality rendering of SVG graphics to PNG format.

Features

  • Convert SVG vector graphics to PNG raster images
  • Maintains original dimensions by default
  • High-quality rendering with Cairo graphics library
  • Supports transparency
  • Preserves image quality

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your SVG file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a PNG file with the same name as the input SVG file in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting logos and icons for web use
  • Creating raster versions of vector graphics
  • Preparing SVG files for platforms that don't support vector formats
  • Generating PNG versions of design assets
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && python prod_apps_clone/python/svg_to_png.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
